prompt: <description>Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with rounded corners. Begin by creating a new coordinate system. Set the Euler angles to [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and the translation vector to [0.0, 0.75, 0.0]. Next, create the 2D sketch on the X-Y plane. Begin with sketching the first face (face\\_1) of the prism. For face\\_1, there are four lines (line\\_1 to line\\_4). Start by drawing line\\_1 from the point [0.0, 0.0] to [0.75, 0.0]. Then, draw line\\_2 from [0.75, 0.0] to [0.75, 0.75], followed by line\\_3 from [0.75, 0.75] to [0.0, 0.75]. Finally, sketch line\\_4 from [0.0, 0.75] back to the starting point [0.0, 0.0]. Keep in mind that, as loop\\_1 is closed, the ending point of a line should be the same as the starting point of the next line. After drawing the four lines of loop\\_1, proceed with scaling the 2D sketch. Set the scaling parameter (sketch\\_scale) to 0.75. Now, transform the 2D sketch into 3D Sketch by applying the coordinate system's Euler angles and translation vector set above. For the extrusion process, set the extrude\\_depth\\_towards\\_normal parameter to 0.75 to define the depth of the object. In this case, extrude\\_depth\\_opposite\\_normal is set to 0.0 as no extrusion is required in the opposite direction. Since this is the first part of the CAD model, create a new solid body by choosing "NewBodyFeatureOperation" as the extrusion's operation. The length, width, and height of part\\_1 are 0.75 units each. Since there are no additional parts in the provided JSON, you can now finalize the current part as the final shape of the CAD model. In summary, construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with rounded corners using the above instructions.</description>
completion:
<json>
{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,-90.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.75,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.75]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.75],"End Point":[0.0,0.75]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.75],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.75,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}}}}
</json>
